ConceptDef.label: Religious Favour
ConceptDef.helpText: Your pawns can accrue favour with various deities. This favour accumulates over a colony, leading to a global favour pool fed by your collective worship. This pool can then be used to help your colony by triggering wonders.

ConceptDef.label: Altars
ConceptDef.helpText: Altars are a center of your colonies religion. You may assign a pawn as preacher, who will hold sermons to others. These sermons help raise global favour and raise spirits.\n\nBeware of preachers of opposing pantheons. They may disturb your colonists, or worse, they may start aggreing to the preachers point of view.
